about_the_game:
Get your hands on The Symbiant Artbook (PDF) and a juicy pack of 4K CGs and sprites from the game! Peak into the behind-the-scenes sketches, art direction process of the game and more!

What you get:

  • ALL of the CGs (+ CG bars) from the game, including explicit illustrations from the sex scenes (gay) and tentacle sex (consensual)
  • Each CG shown in a WIP stage of art
  • Character sprites and expressions (including adults-only nude versions)
  • 8 Exclusive promo-art pieces, commissioned through the course of the game's development
  • Character and CG sketch preview from The Symbiant: After Stories DLC
  • All the backgrounds from the game
  • An artbook of 125 pages
  • A pack of 4K (high resolution) all the sprites and all the CGs from the game with all of the variations (Separate folder from the Artbook!)

content_descriptors.notes:
This content is for adults only. You must be of legal age in your country of residence to view this content. 

The Symbiant - Artbook DLC contains nudity and explicit uncensored sex scenes (gay) and tentacle sex (consensual).

detailed_description:
Get your hands on The Symbiant Artbook (PDF) and a juicy pack of 4K CGs and sprites from the game! Peak into the behind-the-scenes sketches, art direction process of the game and more!

What you get:

  • ALL of the CGs (+ CG bars) from the game, including explicit illustrations from the sex scenes (gay) and tentacle sex (consensual)
  • Each CG shown in a WIP stage of art

  • 8 Exclusive promo-art pieces, commissioned through the course of the game's development
  • Character and CG sketch preview from The Symbiant: After Stories DLC
  • All the backgrounds from the game
  • An artbook of 125 pages
  • A pack of 4K (high resolution) all the sprites and all the CGs from the game with all of the variations (Separate folder from the Artbook!)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Intel Core2 Duo, AMD Phenom II or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 750
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6+
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: The Symbiant - 18+ Artbook & CG Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo, AMD Phenom II or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB

short_description: Explore the behind-the-scenes process of art from The Symbiant and collect all the juicy art! Explicit illustrations from the adult patch included!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Traditional Chinese
